short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to display all SEO meta data and headers structure. Support JSON-LD, Open Graph, Twitter Cards, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SEO Meta Pro: Optimize Your Website with Precision

SEO Meta Pro is a powerful tool for analyzing and optimizing your website, providing detailed information about all meta data and key SEO characteristics of your page. By using this tool, you can better manage SEO and improve your site's visibility on the Internet.


Key Features:
- Title and Length: Check the length of your page title with an indication of its compliance with recommended character limits.

- Description and Length: Analyze the page description and its length to enhance SEO.

- URL and Canonical URL: View the main page URL and canonical URL to avoid content duplication.

- Meta-Robots Tags: Review meta-robots tag settings that determine how search engines crawl and index your page.

- Headers: Display headers H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, and H6 in the order they appear in HTML, helping with content structuring.

- Images: See the number of images on the page, including their ALT attributes for better accessibility and SEO.

- Links: Analyze the number of links on the page, including internal, unique, and other types.

- Social Metadata: View Open Graph and Twitter Card data to improve the appearance of your page on social media.

- Robots.txt and Sitemap.xml: Check the presence and content of your robots.txt and sitemap.xml files to improve indexing.

- Additional Data: Gather additional information about the page, including author, publisher, content language, and other important meta data.


Advantages:
- Visual Clarity: An intuitive interface for quickly viewing all important SEO data.

- Comprehensive Analysis: Covers all aspects of SEO optimization, including meta tags, headers, images, and links.

- Enhanced Visibility: Helps boost your site's visibility in search engines with detailed analysis and recommendations.

- Integration with Other Tools: Analyze your site with additional tools to improve HTML, CSS, Google Rich Snippets, PageSpeed, and more.

SEO Meta Pro is your reliable partner in the world of SEO, providing all the necessary tools for effective website management and improvement.
